entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a teacher at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as saying 'I'm a ruddy teacher, aren't I'.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as arguing with Hagrid.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is Filch's cat. She is mentioned as twisting herself around Filch's ankles.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as cackling and calling out when he hears the commotion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as hurrying off with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as hurrying off with Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid is trying to control Mrs Norris, who is twisting herself around Filch's ankles.
Harry and Hermione are hurrying off together.
